video.title: Lilyhammer
video.synopsis: After testifying against the Mafia, ex-gangster Frank Tagliano enters witness protection and asks to be sent to Norway.

episodes.synopsis: Frank becomes Norwegian citizen "Giovanni Henriksen," meets his neighbor (the police chief) and clashes with his new country's bureaucratic culture.
episodes.title: Reality Check

episodes.synopsis: Frank falls for his language teacher Sigrid and opens a nightclub that's a big hit, but he draws unwanted attention from the police and a biker gang.
episodes.title: The Flamingo

episodes.synopsis: Now a successful local businessman, Frank joins a lucrative real estate deal but his plans are thwarted by the police, who believe he's a terrorist.
episodes.title: Guantanamo Blues

episodes.synopsis: Sigrid learns some surprising news; Frank's deal sours when his partner's son converts to Islam; Geir stumbles on a clue to Frank's identity.
episodes.title: The Midwife

episodes.synopsis: Frank has a fight over a baby carriage but makes a deal to exit his real estate investment; Frank's enemies get an unexpected lead on his location.
episodes.title: My Kind of Town

episodes.synopsis: Flush with cash, Frank buys a new penthouse and invites Sigrid to move in, while Geir's colleagues get bad news and Mafia hitmen arrive in Norway.
episodes.title: Pack Your Lederhosen

episodes.synopsis: The police chief suspects Frank is the link between a murder and a mysterious beating; Frank beefs up security when he learns he's in jeopardy.
episodes.title: The Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: Frank's attempt to rescue Sigrid's son leads to a spectacular shoot-out and a series of shocking revelations that change both his old and new lives.
episodes.title: Trolls

episodes.synopsis: Torgeir's mishap with a moose and a Ferrari enrages a British thief; Frank is alarmed by his twins' proposed names; Jan makes a sweet business deal.
episodes.title: Millwall Brick

episodes.synopsis: Frank gets involved in immigration by sponsoring a computer hacker's relocation to Norway and protecting a local African emigre who's a gifted chef.
episodes.title: Out of Africa

episodes.synopsis: Frank's crew has a showdown with a family of vengeful British gangsters; Sigrid takes a trip and leaves the twins with their ill-prepared father.
episodes.title: Fiddler's Green

episodes.synopsis: Frank wins a Citizen of the Year Award and competes for financing from an investors' circle; a bank robbery has an unexpected connection to Frank.
episodes.title: The Black Toe

episodes.synopsis: Frank goes undercover in Oslo to find the masked thieves who stole his valuables; Torgeir and Roar's mother returns home carrying some baggage.
episodes.title: The Island

episodes.synopsis: Frank turns the tables on some blackmailing thieves; Roar and Torgeir realize their mother's boyfriend isn't the stepfather they were hoping for.
episodes.title: Special Education

episodes.synopsis: A farmer's debt is paid with the deed to a reindeer herd, giving Frank a business idea; Frank meets a new love interest; Jan must flee the country.
episodes.title: The Freezer

episodes.synopsis: A familiar face from the old days shows up in Norway, forcing Frank to return to his New York roots for two very different types of family reunions.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: It's not a happy New Year for Frank, topped off by Jan Johansen's surprise and unwanted return. Meanwhile, Roar is in Rio de Janeiro to get married.
episodes.title: Tiger Boy

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Torgeir head to Brazil to save Roar from his troubles with the law, and Jan has second thoughts about his murder confession.
episodes.title: Foreign Affairs

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Torgeir return from Brazil to find that the Lithuanian gang has raised the stakes, while "Rio Roar" is now a national celebrity.
episodes.title: The Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: With the 20th anniversary of the Lillehammer Winter Olympics approaching, Torgeir hopes to fulfill a dream, and Roar gets a chance to return to Rio.
episodes.title: The Mind is Like a Monkey

episodes.synopsis: When Frank enters the wine business, it stirs up trouble with a local activist; a mob hit goes bad; Rio spells danger for Roar yet again.
episodes.title: Tommy

episodes.synopsis: Frank's new ex-mafia crew member, Tommy, may not be as great as Frank believes, and Roar's Brazilian problems follow him home to Norway.
episodes.title: The Minstrel Boy

episodes.synopsis: Things look good for Jan until his new girlfriend has a fateful request; Roar signs Torgeir's life away; Tommy takes his betrayal up a notch.
episodes.title: The Funeral

episodes.synopsis: The new addition to Tommy's crew shocks Frank and Torgeir; Chris vows to do anything to win back Sigrid; Frank vows to hunt down Jan.
episodes.title: Loose Ends
